FrontEnd.View

Class ProfAssignmentPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • FrontEnd.View.ProfAssignmentPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ProfAssignmentPage
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Creates the ProfAssignmentPage GUI panel - the Assignment page as viewed from a Professor
    Author:
    Ross Bartlett, Antoine Bizon
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
